short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that improves the experience of reading financial documents like 10k's and 10q's

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Before example:
https://fishyreader.com/examples/berkshire/before/index.html

After example:
https://fishyreader.com/examples/berkshire/after/index.html

Features:
- Report gets centered for easier reading on large screens
- Better link coloring and feedback on hover
- Animated scrolling when navigating the document to maintain spatial awareness
- Row highlighting for data tables that helps you read long rows of numbers quickly
- Upgraded typography with a font designed for long readings sessions
- A fixed-width font for financial tables
